messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] New Auction Venue
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks Bob - Yes I do remember, we had been in Japan less than four months. The NBTHK Convention, Dai Token-Ichi, the exhibit at the national Museum it was a
messages.messageBody:
Thanks Bob -
Yes I do remember, we had been in Japan less than four months. The
NBTHK Convention, Dai Token-Ichi, the exhibit at the national Museum
it was a helluva year for swords.
-t
Tom Helm
toryu@...
"Moriamur, et in media arma ruamus"
- Vergil



On Sep 27, 2010, at 6:55 PM, Bob Elder wrote:

>
> Hey Mr. Tom. Remember the 50 th anniversary NBTHK show in Tokyo?
> Gordon Robson gave a speech and included old style Japanese. Mike
> Yamazaki won the shinsa competition. You were there and some chick
> that did Iai. Man was that a good time. I was in the Shinto room
> looking at swords with Mitsuo Hataya Sensei when the Japanese
> president came thru. He had these 7 foot tall body guards.
>
> __._,_._Hey Tom, remeber the 50th anniversery (?)
>
>
> .

>

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] New Auction Venue
messages.msgSnippet: Hey Mr. Tom. Remember the 50 th anniversary NBTHK show in Tokyo? Gordon Robson gave a speech and included old style Japanese. Mike Yamazaki won the shinsa
messages.messageBody:
Hey Mr. Tom. Remember the 50 th anniversary NBTHK show in Tokyo? Gordon Robson gave a speech and included old style Japanese. Mike Yamazaki won the shinsa competition. You were there and some chick that did Iai. Man was that a good time. I was in the Shinto room looking at swords with Mitsuo Hataya Sensei when the Japanese president came thru. He had these 7 foot tall body guards.

__._,_._Hey Tom, remeber the 50th anniversery  (?) 





















.















[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] New Auction Venue
messages.msgSnippet: Yes sir! Had to move back a few years ago and we miss Japan everyday! -t Tom Helm toryu@toryu-mon.com Moriamur, et in media arma ruamus - Vergil ...
messages.messageBody:
Yes sir!
Had to move back a few years ago and we miss Japan everyday!
-t
Tom Helm
toryu@...
"Moriamur, et in media arma ruamus"
- Vergil

Hey Tom, are you in the US now? Bob Elder



--- On Mon, 9/20/10, Tom Helm <junkmail@...> wrote:

From: Tom Helm <junkmail@...>
Subject: [nihontostudy] New Auction Venue
To: nihonto@yahoogroups.com
Cc: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Date: Monday, September 20, 2010, 9:29 AM







 









There is a new site for your nihonto auction items;



http://www.nihontoauction.com/



I am not a part of it but it looks like it will be an excellent

source for quality items without all the sifting thru ebay junk and

Paypal fees...

-t

Tom Helm

toryu@...

"Moriamur, et in media arma ruamus"

- Vergil
